read_directory=aligned_reads_SNS2016_LmF2021-67_bowtie2/                      
# path to aligned reads

output_dir=MACS2-alone_SNS2016/StrandSpecific_norrowPeaks_alone_p005_LmF2021_67  
# output directory name (generated by the sript in the working directory)

file_prefix=aln-pe_LmF2021-67_sorted_reheadered_dups-removed                     
# prefix of mapped reads ($sample$prefix.bam)

input_list=("lm1a_S1_" "lm1b_S2_" "lm3-05b_S5_" "lm3a_S3_" "lm3b_S4_")      
# sample name as found in bam files 

overlap_list=(50)                                                  
# peak overlap to be excluded

window_list=(500)                                       
# window size for peak pair selection
